popularityCurve.label: a unique virtual horizon indicator appears aircraft-style during live view and even shows up in the optical viewfinder while it's useful in some situations we found other features far more appealing among our favorites hdmi output that allows you to play back images in hdtv resolution and the remote control and live view on a computer using supplied software that's something any pro whether in the studio or on location will find useful if not indispensable
